title: Tragédie (duo)
text:
Tragédie (French: [tʁaʒedi]) is a French rap and R&B duo made up of Thierry Rakotomanga (a.k.a. Tizy Bone) and Daniel Guiro (a.k.a. Silky Shaï) from Nantes, France. They had 3 singles that reached #1 in France.


== Discography ==


=== Studio album ===
2003: Tragédie
2004: À fleur de peau
2010:  TBA
